publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2402 Malcolm Chisholm:Anti-Racism Strategy—That the Parliament fully welcomes the Scottish Executive’s continued commitment to tackling racism and promoting race equality; welcomes the high profile One Scotland Many Cultures campaign and flagship Fresh Talent initiative; supports the continuing need to raise awareness of, and tackle, racism in Scotland and to celebrate our diversity; supports the range of Executive activities and actions to promote race equality including work in health, the police and education, and is committed to eradicating racism in Scotland in whatever form it takes to ensure that we create an inclusive and prosperous Scotland. Supported by: Johann Lamont*
